update WF_SERVICE_SETTING
IS_WORK = #{isWork,jdbcType=TINYINT},
REQUIREMENT_NOTIFY = #{requirementNotify,jdbcType=TINYINT},
BUY_REQUIREMENT_NOTIFY = #{buyRequirementNotify,jdbcType=TINYINT},
RENT_REQUIREMENT_NOTIFY = #{rentRequirementNotify,jdbcType=TINYINT},
RENT_BROKERAGE = #{rentBrokerage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALE_BROKERAGE_RATIO = #{saleBrokerageRatio,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SMS_NOTIFY = #{smsNotify,jdbcType=TINYINT},
BUY_MONEY = #{buyMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RENT_MONEY = #{rentMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WD_HB_SWITCH = #{wdHbSwitch,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ARCHIVE_ID = #{archiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update WF_SERVICE_SETTING set IS_WORK = #{isWork,jdbcType=TINYINT}, REQUIREMENT_NOTIFY = #{requirementNotify,jdbcType=TINYINT}, BUY_REQUIREMENT_NOTIFY = #{buyRequirementNotify,jdbcType=TINYINT}, RENT_REQUIREMENT_NOTIFY = #{rentRequirementNotify,jdbcType=TINYINT}, RENT_BROKERAGE = #{rentBrokerage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALE_BROKERAGE_RATIO = #{saleBrokerageRatio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SMS_NOTIFY = #{smsNotify,jdbcType=TINYINT}, BUY_MONEY = #{buyMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RENT_MONEY = #{rentMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WD_HB_SWITCH = #{wdHbSwitch,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ARCHIVE_ID = #{archiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
